text: Divalani vata evi che, ke a saheramam be anatha balako che, jemano khajano temani te divala nice datelo che, temana pita khuba ja sadacari hatam, to tamara palanaharani iccha hati ke a banne anatha yuvana vaye pahonci potano a khajano tamara palanaharani krpa ane rahamatani sathe kadhi le. Mem mari icchathi ko'i karya nathi karyum, a hati satya vata te kis'sa'oni jena para tame dhiraja na rakhi
